snippet: A retrospective of the Los Angeles artist at the New Museum will include his thrift store paintings, which made an impact in a 1991 New York exhibit.
abstract: New Museum is set to open exhibition The End Is Here, retrospective of drawings and paintings by Jim Shaw; Los Angeles artist, known for disturbing genre sometimes called 'abject,' weaves relics of past cults, fringe philosophies and other underground memorabilia into startling works.
lead_paragraph: A retrospective of the Los Angeles artist at the New Museum will include his thrift store paintings, which made an impact in a 1991 New York exhibit.

headline.main: Jim Shaw, From Trash Bins and Swap Meets, a Prodigious Body of Work
headline.print_headline: The Clutter of Culture, Artfully Poised
